title: 2021hope
content: There’s no “summer break” for our neighbors who are suffering from homelessness and hunger. Food and water are scarce, dehydration and heatstroke are common, and the threat of violence and sickness is everywhere. But your gift today can provide a hope for a home for our neighbors in need. Thank you for providing meals, shelter, life-restoring programs, and compassionate support. You are appreciated!
